name: TheMeatStick-TRUEWirelessMeatThermometer
0:
”Alexa, ask Meat Stick, what is the temperature?”
”Alexa, ask Meat Stick, check on my meat.”
”Alexa, ask Meat Stick, how long until my meat's done?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: meat stick
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The MeatStick skill requires The MeatStick TRUE Wireless Meat thermometer and the WiFi Bridge or a spare smart device with The MeatStick App.

Talk to Alexa to find out the current temperature of your meat or when it will be done instead of opening up the App.
